title: Pixel randomly shuts down and freezes
content: Since Monday my pixel has freezed anytime I try to make a phone call or receive one. It took forever to get it unfroze and reboot. Now it does this everyday couple times a day and takes hours for it to do anything. It'll be stick on the startup screen with the Google logo then after a couple of hours a black screen pops up saying my phone is corrupted and it can't reboot.
